info: Coder and musician. On the small Atari created in 1993-1997. Co-founder of Best Quality groups and Cobra. His achievements include dozens of tunes, a few simple games, a lot of useful tools such as. INT Converter, QA Swap handler to read the floppy PC-ish, QuaST Party Invitation for 1997. The last, so far, its production is QASM of 2000.
